## ðŸš€ Quick Start

### Usage

Run Claude Code with the plugin loaded:

```bash
claude --plugin-dir /path/to/ailloy
```

Or run the install script to see available commands:

```bash
cd ailloy
./scripts/install.sh
```

## ðŸ“‹ Available Commands

Commands are namespaced under `/ailloy:`. Use them in Claude Code like:

```
/ailloy:create-issue
```

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/ailloy:create-issue` | This command is used to instruct Claude to generate GitHub issues in the specific house style and... |
| `/ailloy:open-pr` | AI-assisted workflow command |
| `/ailloy:pr-comments` | This command helps PR authors respond to review comments efficiently. It fetches PR details and c... |
| `/ailloy:pr-description` | AI-assisted workflow command |
| `/ailloy:pr-review` | This command helps reviewers conduct comprehensive code reviews efficiently. It analyzes PR chang... |
| `/ailloy:preflight` | AI-assisted workflow command |
| `/ailloy:start-issue` | AI-assisted workflow command |
| `/ailloy:update-pr` | AI-assisted workflow command |
